description: Now that’s a sight I could get used to: Pedro Andreas is sitting back with his hard-on saluting northward for Rikk York to get to work on. I’m used to seeing Rikk on his Twitter account where he comes off as a no-bullshit top. But he’s taking plenty of bullshit from Pedro Andreas in this scene: sucking his cock, only to get fucked, and then right back to sucking cock all over again. (Yes fans -- that means ass to mouth!) I just hope Rikk York is ready, because Pedro Andreas has plenty of raw dick to give!
title: Rikk York Gives Up His Hole To Pedro Andreas
